name: Spider-Man: The Movie
description:
Spider-Man: The Movie is an action-arcade game developed by Neversoft and LTI Gray Matter. It was originally released in 2002. Activision Blizzard published the game. Spider-Man: The Movie has a Metascore of 77, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Spider-Man: The Movie is available on PC, PlayStation 2, Xbox and GameCube.
It was scored by Dick De Benedictis and Michael McCuistion.
